name: Logitech K740 Wired Slim Keyboard

Research shows that a longer distance required for each keystroke (key travel) improves your typing experience. Every stroke is comfortable, fluid, and silent. Tested for up to 10 million keystrokes., Soft-touch palm rest and full-size key layout: Make your typing experience more comfortableâ€”even after extended use., One-touch multimedia controls: Includes volume controls for music and video.
